channel.description: Recent content in preprint on David John Baker

item.title: The Perceptual Attraction of Pre-Dominant Chords
item.description: Earlier this year a collaboration paper I worked on was accepted at Music Perception.

item.title: Understanding Melodic Dictation via Experimental Methods
item.description: Last month I received a copy of The Routledge Companion to Aural Skills Pedagogy featuring a chapter titled “Understanding Melodic Dictation via Experimental Methods” by yours truly!

item.title: The MeloSol Corpus
item.description: Earlier this month I learned some of the research from my dissertation was accepted for publication!
